craf.name: AdaptiveHelm
craf.add_attrs:
Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The holder gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain 45 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Take 5% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craf.name: Crownguard
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the Shield expires, gain 25% Ability Power.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

craf.name: Evenshroud
craf.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain 20 Mana.

At 40% Health, gain 15 Mana and a Shield equal to 20% max Health.

craf.add_attrs: Gain 15% additional Damage Amp against Tanks.

craf.add_attrs: Critical Strikes grant 5% Damage Amp for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable, shed negative effects, and heal 30% missing health.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Gain 7% stacking Attack Speed every second.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
- 15% Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp.

While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:

craf.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 150% of the Mana spent

craf.name: LastWhisper

spec.name: CrownOfDemacia
spec.desc:
If the holder is a Tank, regenerate 3-21% maximum Health every 2 seconds (based on stage). Otherwise, gain 10% %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power every 2 seconds instead.

If the holder of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.

You can remove this item by benching the holder.

spec.name: FirstMatesFlintlock
spec.desc:
Every second during combat, gain 3% Attack Damage and 3% Attack Speed.

Recommended holder: Miss Fortune

spec.name: FreebootersFrock
spec.desc:
While above 50% Health, double the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses from this item.

Every 4 seconds, deal magic damage equal to 50% of current total Armor and Magic Resist to the 2 nearest enemies.

Recommended holder: Nautilus

spec.name: HauntedSpyglass
spec.desc:
NYI
Once per fight, after 3 takedowns, summon the ghost of the Dreadway, dealing 650%(%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 3-hex radius.

spec.name: JollyRoger
spec.desc: NYI The bearer becomes the Captain! Grant allies (a really cool effect) while the bearer is alive.

spec.name: PileOCitrus
spec.desc:
Every 7 seconds, heal 15% max Health and shed all negative effects. After 15 seconds, gain 10 %i:scaleSerpents%.

Recommended holder: Illaoi

spec.name: 90CaliberNets
spec.desc: Stun the 3 enemies who have dealt the most damage for 2 seconds.

spec.name: AccelerationGate
spec.desc: After casting, Piltover units restore 35% of their max Mana over 2 seconds.

spec.name: ArmorNullifier
spec.desc: Piltover units deal 25% more damage, increased to 45% against Tanks.

spec.name: BlastShield
spec.desc: All allies gain a 18% max Health Shield.

spec.name: ContinuumCogs
spec.desc: All allies gain 2 Mana Regen and 15 Ability Power.

spec.name: EchoEngine
spec.desc: For the rest of combat, repeat the effects of your other Modules every 7 seconds.

spec.name: ElectricalOverload
spec.desc: Deal 50 + 10% max Health as true damage to all enemies.

spec.name: EMP
spec.desc: Increase the Mana cost of all enemies' next cast by 15.

spec.name: GigantificationRay
spec.desc: Piltover units gain 28% max Health and become much larger.

spec.name: KineticBarrier
spec.desc: Piltover units gain 65 Armor and 30 Magic Resist. If they've taken more magic damage than physical, they gain the opposite.

spec.name: MagnetronCoil
spec.desc: Piltover units gain 16% Damage Amp, increased by 1% for each cast from any Piltover unit this combat before this Module triggered.

spec.name: MicroRockets
spec.desc: Fire a barrage of missiles that repeats 66% of the damage dealt by Piltover units this combat as magic damage.

spec.name: MiningDrill
spec.desc: Gain 1 Gold or 1 Boot, randomly. (Repeats for every Piltover cast!)

spec.name: MomentumDrive
spec.desc: Cleanse all allied crowd control effects. Your team gains 50% Tenacity.

spec.name: OverclockedCapacitors
spec.desc: Grant your team 25% Attack Speed.

spec.name: SuperiorLifeform
spec.desc: Summon a robot copy of your 2 strongest Piltover units. They have 40% of the original's Health and deal 50% as much damage.

spec.name: TunedOscillator
spec.desc: Increase your team's Healing and Shielding by 28%.

spec.name: UnstableCore
spec.desc: If Piltover units have cast at least 10 times this combat, deal 30% max Health true damage to all enemies. Otherwise, deal 15%.

spec.name: AdrenalineModules
spec.desc:
Gain 15% Damage Amp, increased by 1% after every 3 attacks.

Recommended users: Bel'Veth and Kai'sa

spec.name: IronCarapace
spec.desc:
Gain 200 max Health. Gain Armor and Magic Resist equal to 0.6% of max Health.

Recommended users: Cho'Gath and Rift Herald

spec.name: LeechingNucleus
spec.desc:
Heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage dealt. After damaging an enemy, steal 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power from them, up to 15 stacks from all sources.

Recommended users: Kog'Maw, Malzahar, and Kai'sa

spec.name: PredatorInstincts
spec.desc:
Gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Every 9 seconds, cleanse crowd control effects and become untargetable for 1 second(s).

Recommended users: Rek'Sai and Bel'Veth

spec.name: RoyalHusk
spec.desc:
Gain 200 Health. After dropping below 50% max Health, spawn a Voidling with 30% of this unit's max Health.

Recommended users: Cho'Gath and Rift Herald

spec.name: SpitterSpines
spec.desc:
After dealing 1000 damage, fire spikes at the 2 nearest enemies that deal 100 physical damage.

Recommended users: Rek'Sai, Malzahar, and Kai'sa

spec.name: Upgrade
spec.desc: Upgrade a random item on your strongest Piltover unit to Radiant. They also gain 25% Attack Speed and 300 max Health.

spec.name: VoltageConduit
spec.desc: Reduce the max Mana of Piltover units by 30%.
